model

Class Batisseurs

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Batisseurs
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Batisseurs
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class acts as an intermediary between the controller and the game engine. It handles the exit, save & load mecanisms, and instanciate a new game engine.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Titouan LE BERRE
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Batisseurs

        public Batisseurs(Mode gamemode,
                  int nbPlayers,
                  int HumanPlayers)
        The class' second constructor.
        Parameters:
        gamemode - The game's mode, human vs human(s) or human vs AI(s)
        nbPlayers - The number of players in the game
        HumanPlayers - The number of "real" players

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String path)
        This method allows the user to resume a saved game, by instanciating the objects again in their correct state.
        Parameters:
        path - The save file's path in the filesystem.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case the path is wrong/lead to nothing

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String path)
        This method allows the user to save the objects state of the current game.
        Parameters:
        path - The path in the filesystem where the file will be written.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case the path is wrong/lead to nothing.
